description:
There is everything from kitchen utensils and bathroom equipment to things like a stove, shower products and entertainment-related things, like a pool table and a PC for games. It is a great addon if you want more options to decorate your home.

Changelog
Some bugs from the previous update were fixed
Some textures were changed
Reduced textures to be compatible with more devices
Fixed bug when pausing the game
Blocks are now displayed again in the game
Rose gold blocks and additions are no longer displayed in the creative menu
But they are still in the game (you can play normal)
Compatible with 1.16 and beta
Doors are disabled due to a bug that caused the game to crash
Now the fan when placing it will be on (it can be turned off if you give the shift + click)
Some files were changed
Now the crib does not break when you have a baby inside
Nnow when putting a lamp on the floor does not disappear the block below 
The lamp model was changed
An error that caused it to crash was solved
Etc..
short_description: This add-on adds many decorations, more villagers.

description:
Each of them include a unique set of behaviors. For example, some of them you can tame and ride and others you have to be extra careful with since their aggressive behavior will make them want to kill and eat you. Also, make sure to try out the Jurassic Craft World map!
Changelog

Added Carnotaurus
Added Decorative blocks (replaces Shulker and dyes can be used for changing the shapes)
Fixed sounds and behavior bugs
short_description: Jurassic Craft is an incredible addon which includes 19 different dinosaurs in one pack.

description: This is a texture pack that replaces some mobs with beasts.
short_description: Replace: Bat = Bee | Ocelot = Lion | Sheep = Elephant | Llama = Giraffe | Cow = Buffalo | Polar Bear = Rhino | Silverfish = Snake

description:
RedstoneLover decided to create it after he had watched Pat and Jen play the Java mod. The add-on includes several elements which you would recognize if you’ve ever watched The Walking Dead which is a very popular TV show about people surviving a zombie apocalypse. Some features include new zombies like the Walker and Runner and also new weapons.

Changelog
v0.1.0:

Chickens, Cows, Pigs and Sheep will atempt to flee away from players
Zombies will now kill these four passive animals.
short_description: This addon is a remake of the mod for Java Edition called “Crafting Dead”.

description:
This addon is very useful for server reamls similar to the popular Karmaland series, all clothes will be at this time thanks for you. 
Changelog
I will add new clothes in each update at the moment there are only 87 pieces of clothes.
short_description: Add new craftable clothes to be able to use in their worlds simulating the java mods of clothes this addon adds 70 +17 pieces of totally placeable clothes

description:
Take on any enemy that comes your way.Become one with your dragon and show everyone that the bond you share with your dragon is unmatched . Do you have what it takes to become a dragon master ?
Tame the dragon only at night time when it is on ground using golden_apple 
You need to place a command_block and input function fly_system
Make it repeat and always active
To get command blocks simply
/give @p command_block
short_description: Want your own fire breathing dragon then this is the addon for you soar through the air and go wherever it will take you.

description:
There are a total of 58 different things that can occur from breaking the lucky blocks.

Changelog
Bug Fixes
Added 4 new possible effects from lucky blocks
short_description: This addon adds 3 lucky blocks to the game, which can be opened by breaking them.

description:
This add-on customizes a ghast to be a working 10-seat Battle Bus that can fly over your map! Use this in any Fortnite inspired map and make sure to credit Cleverlike

Changelog

Fixes a problem with PE versions mounting it
short_description: Stop building your Battle Bus out of blocks!

description:
I will be adding more structures in the future!

Added new structures, Small Mineshaft with Entrance, Endermite Nest, Ruin Spawner, Wild Carrots, Wild Potatoes, Crashed Endship, Fishing Hut, Mesa Pyramid
Removed file mistakenly put into add-on
Tweaked spawn rates of some structures
Large cacti will no longer spawn in Mesa biome
short_description: More Simple Structures Addon adds new naturally spawning structures to your Minecraft world for you to seek out or run into

short_description: This Add on replicates as best as possible the behaviors, designs and animations of the exclusive entities in Minecraft Dungeons for Minecraft Bedrock 1.16 .

description:
Well this addon will add over 20 new swords to the game, all of which are craftable and some even having special abilities! Enjoy it!

Changelog

Added 3 new swords - Flimsy Sword, Bone Sword and Purpur Sword
Added a new swords+ example world that shows off all the swords, what they do and how to craft them!
Reduced the effectiveness of the speed boost from the Lapis Sword
Slightly buffed the damage of the Obsidian and Coal Swords
Updated texture of Netherrack Sword
All the swords will now show you how much damage they do on their name
Fixed the swords function command not giving you the end stone, bamboo and quartz swords
short_description: Do you like swords in Minecraft? But do you think that there is not enough of them?

description:
Today is now your day, This add-on transforms creatures from minecraft to anime girls from AT2’s art and Yarr’s Cute Mob Models Mod.

Added: a picture for people who are interested in voice acting.

description:
Hopefully it will develop into an interesting addon for the concept of animal concepts in Minecraft going forward, and there will be many animals, and the behavior of animals is real. This addon can be support in versions 1.8, 1.9 and 1.10 beta

[ FRIENDLY AND DANGER FOX ]
Now you can tame only Red Fox at this moment
Now Red Fox will hunting at night ( becareful ) and you can't tame them when hunting
short_description: This addon adds a variety of new animals that are not yet in Minecraft.for now this is still in beta

description:
Helper: Keyyard, Twitter Account

 It also adds a whole bunch of new items such as underwater helmets and powerful weapons. You can also ride on flying chairs and cool motorcycles while fighting many of the different evil robots around the world. As a whole, it’s a really good add-on with lots of cool features which will greatly enhance your survival gameplay experience!

Changelog

Technology Evolution:

Now This addon more optimized for survival mode
Now Model for Dispenser and Dropper robot!
New Model for Protector bot
New Model for Necrocircuit
New Model for Robot Workbench
New Model for TNT Anator
New Robotic Sounds For Destoyer, Scorpion, Flyborg, And TNT Anator

Added Miwi

Added Supply Chest
Added Addons And Info Menu

Added RPG Rocket, Weapon For Sea Destroyer
Added Destroyers Mob Head
Added Redstone Water Helmet
Added Redstone Night Vision Halmet
Added Mechanic Block
Now Redstone Legion Transform To Miwi When Death
Nether Dimension Now Transformed To Redstone Dimension
Bug Fixes

Fix Protectorbot Not Attacking Nearest Mob
Fix Auto Scorpion Stuck, Not Moving
Fix Dropper Robot Model Contain Villager Model
Fix Fireball, Shockhave, Arrow Not Disapear
Fix Explosion Destroy Block When Gamerule Mob Griefing False
short_description: Redstone Mechanic is an add-on which replaces 25 vanilla mobs with awesome Redstone mobs!

description:
Credits: Cleverlike (Twitter) (Website) (Battle Bus Add-on), ATK by TeamBOB123
There are plenty weapons to choose from, and you can even ride the Battle Bus or a Shopping Cart. While it’s still very much Minecraft, a lot of things have been completed transformed to look more like Fortnite. So if you’re an avid fan of Minecraft and Fortnite, then this add-on is great for you!

Changelog

Added Suppressed Assault Rifle, Compact SMG, and Minigun
Removed Revolver and Drum Gun
short_description: This add-on includes weapons, items and new entities from the game Fortnite.

In this fourth beta we added Dodo, Stegosaurus, Gigantoraptor, Spinosaurus and Dilofosaurus all with posibiliti of domesticated and mountable all over Minecraft.

description:
iMac, coffee maker, a telephone, blender, entertainment system, a couch and a speaker, created focused on high detail and almost everything made block by block.
Add a modern and realistic touch to your house with our modern looking furniture

Changelog
Added a few animations to the grill and the toaster, and a gaming chair. This have not crafting recipes because people been reporting they dont craft what they said or they dont even craft anything, so im removing them and looking for something else

description:
This addon have 13 3D guns and 1 3D weapon. Warning this is 3rd BETA! All guns have run animations,
To reload all the guns you need to hold ammo for a certain weapon in your hand!
Changelog
In this update, I removed all the things that I stole from other Addons on my own!
short_description: I am a Russian youtuber MishaAlphaGK and I present to you my addon that adds 3D weapons and 3D guns for minecraft PE. Addon for version 1.14.60 – new version.

description: With this add-on you can now experience the beauty that is the portal gun and you can now troll the animals and even your friends by teleporting them everywhere.
short_description: Want to experience the portal gun of java but in bedrock?

description:
Same as in Fortnite, you are able to ride it and there is also a storage in the Shopping Cart with support for 27 slots. It’s slightly strange to be riding around in in a Shopping Cart in Minecraft, but it’s definitely useful if you want a slightly faster way of travel while getting some more storage for your items during your travels.
The Shopping Carts replace the Spider and the Cave Spider
You can ride the Shopping Cart and also make use of its 27 slots inventory.
short_description: This add-on adds the famous Shopping Carts in Fortnite to Minecraft: Bedrock Edition.

description:
Try the Terraria Mod it adds lots of Terrarias features, and my goal is to soon have add all of Terrraria’s content into Minecraft! Fight the Eye of Cthulu, dig for rare ores, explore the dangerous Crimson biome, and much more!

Fancy and handy, you now could craft a furniture for your Minecraft World. This Add-on give a furniture for you to use.

description:
This addon contains 100 new animals for your game, some cute, some not so friendly, but all amazing and super fun, with various varieties of animation, behavior, models and textures.

Changelog

Many bugs fixed.
- News and improvements for yCreaturesPlus (1.13 betas).
- Spawn of corrected yCreatures animals.
- Bug of animations of some aquatic animals have been fixed.
- Added simple drops to animals.
- Added sound to most animals, the rest turns soon.
- Nametag can now be used on most animals.
- Almost all animals are already leachable.
- Mouse added.
- Made some improvements in some animations.
- Camels, ostriches and rhinos can be used as a mount.
- Zebra doesn't die alone by being in a lowland biome.
- Added improvements to the zoo Zookeeper!
short_description: yCreatures, an amazing super complete add-on that brings even more fun to your Minecraft worlds!!

short_description: This add-on adds many decorations, more villagers.

description:
The train is much larger than an ordinary minecart and it also have seats for more players (2 max). So if you’re looking for something more realistic and fun than an ordinary minecart then you definitely have to check out the Train Add-on!
How does it work?
It works similar to an ordinary minecart in that sense that you place it down by placing it on a trail track. As it replaces the minecart it has the same name and crafting recipe as well.
Up to 2 players can ride the train at the same time. This makes it very useful in case you’re playing multiplayer and need to transport multiple people at the same time.
short_description: This is a train add-on which replaces the minecart with a famous Japanese train called the JY E235 series which is an electric train used for commuting by the general public.

description:
The boss entity is extremely powerful, so make sure that you have powerful weapons, plenty of food and a strong armor before fighting it. Just like the Command Block, this mob has abilities such as summoning entities, projectiles and even teleport.

The Commander Boss Machine spawns in the Overworld as it replaces the Creeper. You can also spawn it manually by using the Creeper Spawn Egg.
hangelog

Commander’s charged armor is now red.
Improved behavior.
Has now the ability to summon and shoot more entities and modified entities. ( added endermen, zombie pigmen, mutant silverfishes, commandborgs, commandbots, red commandbots, TNTs, and command eggs )
Removed chemical projectiles.
Regenerates health when it summons lightning bolts.
Health is decreased to 750.
Blaze rod is replaced by command sword.
Exploding pigs drop tnt when killed.
Commander Boss drops commander skull, command block, and redstone when killed.
Removed baby zombies and baby husks spawn by the boss.
Retextured particle effects from spell effects.
Can now attacks iron golems, the same behavior as the other entities the boss is summoning.
short_description: The Commander Boss Machine Addon implements a new boss to the game as well as some other additional mobs and items.

description:
It is part of the illager team that spawns in the snowy biomes at night time and will throw these ice blocks at it’s targets such as villagers, iron golems, players, and snow golems!
Iceologer:

A illager mob that is powerful with its iceblocks which is used for its targets! It spawns in snow biomes at night time and killing it will drop some emeralds along with blue ice and snow blocks.

Health 30 (15 hearts)
short_description: In Iceologer Add-On, it adds a new mob from Minecraft Dungeons and could be the new voted mob for minecraft that they recently announced for October 3rd (during Minecraft Live).

description:
Can you search who is the impostor, you can get as a skin a crew member of one color.
Skins 4D:
You can have as a skin of a crew member of one color, for that you must enter this command:

/replaceitem entity @p slot.armor.head 1 (Skin)
Skins: among_us:

Changelog
A version compatible with Minecraft beta 1.16.100.50 has been added, users using this version will be able to use the 4D skins.
short_description: With this add-on add to your Minecraft the characters of the video game Among Us

description:
This add-on will focus on adding the dinosaurs from jpog!

description:
Well, this add-on was created to help with that. By using this add-on it will modify the loot for the different chests in-game. All chests will be filled with much more items than usual and most of the items will also be useful for your survival. But don’t worry, it’s by no means overpowered so survival mode won’t be that much different.
All treasures which you find (e.g. in temples or stronghold) now come with much more valuable loot.
short_description: Do you find yourself searching for treasures but often finding useless items?

description:
All the furniture are blocks with 3D models and can be manufactured in survival mode.

short_description: With this add-on add new furniture and decorations to your Minecraft, it works to decorate your house,

description:
Such as 3D Weapons! Then you should definitely try ActualGuns 3D, this addon is available for Minecraft bedrock edition.

Changelog
- Fixed shotgun and Taurus bullet fire issue from the server (behavior) side, it should sync with the client (resource) now
- Fixed M3 Shotgun bullet, now they spread and deals equal damage
- Reduced the lag by recreating the item textures, now they are 32x32 instead of 256x
- Fixed Taurus random animation bug that would cause the gun to resize in the same size as the player
- Added new function commands to get guns and mag/ammo
short_description: Do you like gun addons? like all-time popular ActualGuns addon, what about trying something new?

description:
Looking for something new, but don’t want to use an addon that fakes it with entities? Look no further
Bumble Crops! introduces 8 new crops to your Minecraft world that can be accessed both in survival and creative modes! These crops are actual blocks and behave identically to the vanilla crops, being planted with seeds and then gradually growing over time until ready to harvest! Just like vanilla crops, you can also use bone meal to speed the process up if you’re impatient!
short_description: Are you tired of the same old boring crops in Minecraft?

description:
Each raft is equipped with a chest where you can store your items while out traveling on the open seas. The chest has 27 slots so there’s plenty of room for you on your travels. The model is neatly detailed with sails, an oar and other objects to make it as realistic looking as possible.
How does it work?
The boat functions almost the same as to the vanilla boat. The only major difference you will notice is that there is a chest storage for it. You can access the chest storage either by opening the inventory while seated on the boat, or by sneak-tapping on the boat.
short_description: This add-on replaces all different boat types with rafts in a multitude of style and color.

description:
This addon also automatically gives your items and your armor max level enchants when you hold them.
This addon includes:

Auto max enchanting items/armor
Resistance for the player
Automatically kills most nearby hostile mobs
Easy mode makes the game much easier to complete, it was intended for beginners or for quicker playthroughs. It takes away the need to cook food, enchant your items, and to defeat most enemies.
Changelog
+ Added a video showcasing the addon

+ Bug Fixes
short_description: This addon makes Minecraft much easier by making it almost impossible to die

description:
The main vanilla mobs (Zombie, Drowned, Husk, Skeleton, Stray, Wither Skeleton, Piglin, Spider, Cave Spider, and Witch) have increased base movement speed, hp and attack damage.

Changelog
-Added Skeleton Guards
-Replaced Skeletons in the Nether with Nether Skeletons
-Added a Rusted Shield Model to the Zombie Soldier
short_description: This Add-on makes the game harder and adds 14 new mobs to the game

description:
All vehicles are designed in a style to stay true to the original Minecraft graphics which makes them a great addition to the game experience. It’s time to upgrade those horses with the latest technology today!

Changelog

Bug Fixes
Minebike recipe has been updated
Minebike has an updated look
Motorcycle now drops itself.
Grass Block Sticker now works
Minebike: fixed part-invisible chest
New & Updated Entities
Added Minetrain
Added Dotto Minetrain
Added Minecopter
New behavior & new look for Mineplane
Added RC Cars & Controllers
Added Minekart
Added Props (e.g. traffic cones, street lights and more)
New behavior for Minemarine
Vehicles no longer drop XP and they have a smoother animation when killed
New sounds for the new vehicles
New “How To Play” UI made by @solveddev
short_description: This addon implements 11 modern vehicles and it includes everything from cars to a flyable helicopter.

description:
Kitchen tools
KITCHEN TOOLS ARE USED TO MAKE FLOUR, BUTTER AND MANY OTHER THINGS.
Knife
THE KNIFE IS AN IMPORTANT TOOL FOR MAKING FLOUR AND CUTTING MEAT, TO MAKE IT VERY SIMPLE, YOU WILL NEED A STICK AND AN IRON.
Bowl 
The bowl is used to mix ingredients, serves to make butter and large bread, to make the bowl you will need a bowl and an iron.
Butter
Butter is used to make big bread, to make you need a bowl, salt, milk bag and wheat.
Flour
The flour is used to make big bread, to make you need a knife and wheat.
Big Bread
Big bread has a higher saturation than normal bread and it also serves to make burgers, to make you need a bowl, butter and flour.
Salt
salt is used to season meat and make other foods, to make you need a water bag.
Salted Meat
Salted meat has a higher saturation than normal meats, to make it simple, just put any type of meat with salt on top.
It can be cooked too, you can cook it in the furnace or put salt on top of the cooked meat.
Sliced Beef
The sliced beef it is cut meat, so far it is useless, it only serves to eat, to make you need steak and a knife.
Burger
The burger has a lot of saturation, to make you need cooked bacon, salted meat, Two large breads and sliced ​​tomato
etc

Changelog
- Added Burger
- Added Bacon
- when you make the milk bag the bucket comes back to you.
- Fixed Bugs
short_description: This addon adds new foods and cooking tools in the next updates we will add more food

description:
This add-on will give you this opportunity, adding monsters from movies and myths to minecraft.Such as: Wendigo, Rake, Alien, Siren head.

Changelog
Add 7 monster
Add 1 boss
Add 1 secret mob
short_description: Have you ever wanted to see monsters from movies and myths in your world?

description:
There are Apples, Melons, Chorus Fruit (not exactly realistic) and Pumpkins. This doesn’t really represent the variation of fruit which exist in real life. However, by installing this add-on you will be able to eat 18 new fruit items. All fruit items need to be obtained by using commands currently, but hopefully there will be a better way to obtain the fruit soon.

How does it work?
There is only one way to obtain the fruit currently and that’s by using the following text commands. Make sure to replace the ID with a number.

/give @s yellow_flower 1 [insert ID: 1-15]
/give @s red_flower 1 [insert ID: 9-10]

Fruit List
Banana
Blueberries
Cantaloupe
Cherries
Coconut
Grapes
Green Apple
Lemon
Lime
Mango
Orange
Peach
Pear
Pomegranate
Strawberry
Tomato
White Grapes
short_description: Minecraft has for a long time been limited to just a few different fruits.

description:
These models were all based on real IKEA furniture in order to have professionally designed amenities.
Of course, there is nothing more inspirational than a beautiful showroom.
short_description: This addon adds 50 pieces of IKEA furniture to let you express your creativity at an entirely new level.

description:
This myth is quickly spreading all over the world and now the Garuda has made its way to Minecraft. It’s basically a giant bird which replaces the new Phantom mob in Minecraft. It has several new abilities which makes most players an easy prey for it.
The Garuda is a giant bird which replaces the new Phantom mob which was added in the latest Bedrock beta. It’s very strong so you must be well prepared if you ever wish to defeat him. By killing Garuda you’ll get lots of feathers as well as some raw chicken.
You can either come across the Garuda randomly in your worlds or by spawning it with spawn eggs.
short_description: Old legends speak of the Garuda but some people just believe that Garuda is actually just a myth.

description:
Basically, these addons freeze all entities/mobs in your worlds. In the Freeze Time addon, the player can interact with the world still, but time is frozen – however, in the Pause addon the player is also frozen and cannot interact with the world.
Use /function help whilst using this addon to receive information about how to use it.
short_description: This addon allows you to pause and freeze time in your own worlds

description:
I have figured out a way to bring chisel to bedrock edition and it uses one of the brand new blocks the stone cutter!
On Bedrock we recently got the stone cutter in the game and when using it i noticed its functionality is very similar to the chisel from java edition so I decided to get to work moving it over. This Add-on currently adds over 2,000 new blocks to decorate with and there will be more on the way!

Changelog
Added
Bookshelves and variants
Glass
Different crafting tables for alternate wood types. See Recipe above to learn how to craft.
short_description: The Chisel mod is a very popular decoration mod used frequently on java edition but bedrock edition has not had access to it, until now

short_description: Did you think the SCP Foundation could never be in Minecraft Bedrock Edition?

description:
It adds more than 10 new water mobs as well as a whole lot of new armor and items. The addon has been specifically designed for survival mode. For example, all mobs will naturally appear in the water, so you don’t have to waste any time spawning them yourself. It’s like a super cool upgrade of the already awesome Update Aquatic!

Mobs
Amphibious Humanoid (replaces Ghast)
Water Monster (Boss) (replaces Witch)
Steam Machine (Boss) (replaces Wither)
King Mermaid (Boss) (replaces Creeper)
Killer whale (replaces Evoker)
Mermaid (replaces Husk)
Mermaid (replaces Zombie)
Mermaid (replaces Zombie Pigman)
V,LEMO (replaces Stray)
Seiren (replaces Drowned)
Sea Turtle (replaces Wolf)
Moorish Idol (replaces Moorish Idol)
Trilobite (replaces Silverfish)
Angler fish (replaces Spider)
Random Spawn (replaces Cave Spider)
Frying Block (replaces Vex)
Random Chest (replaces Zombie Villager)
Shark (by Julien) (replaces Guardian)
Megalodon (by Julien) (replaces Elder Guardian)
Raft (replaces Boat)
Items
Diving Helmet MkII (replaces Creeper Skull)
Diving Helmet MkI (replaces Diamond Helmet)
Diving Suit (replaces Diamond Chestplate)
Diving Leggins (replaces Diamond Leggings)
Diving Boots (replaces Diamond Boots)
Manaia Necklace (replaces Iron Chestplate)
Hook Necklace (replaces Chainmail Chestplate)
Tiki Necklace (replaces Golden Chestplate)
Orca Trophy (replaces Dragon Head)
Crystal Sword (replaces Diamond Sword)
Crystal (replaces Diamond)
Underwater Gun (replaces Bow)
Bullet (replaces Arrow)

Important note: 

Shark is made by Jujustyle7 (approved)
short_description: Mysterious SEA is the perfect add-on for anyone who love exploring the ocean.

description:
Well you’re in luck because we will give you a Plants vs Zombies experience in MCPE/MCBE.
This addon will give you nostalgia, I can guarantee that.

ChangelogView more
•Added Zomboss
•Added Jack in the Box Zombie and Balloon Zombie
•Fixed Major Bugs:(plant size,plant attacks and damage,plants no longer attack you,fixed coconut cannon added cooldown reduced damage,etc)

Bloomerang, Coconut Cannon, Cold Snapdragon, Doomshroom, Ice Shroom, Jalapeño, Lightning Reed, Peanut, Peapod, Pumpkin, Pumpkin Pult, Snappea, Spikerock,& Starfruit

short_description: Are you one of those OG fans of the game Plants vs Zombies?

description:
The gauntlet is basically a large wearable glove which gives the person wearing it superpowers. You’ll be able to beat down enemies with just a few punches, run faster than most mobs in-game and also do a whole lot more awesome things.
The gauntlet replaces Trident so this means you will either need to kill Drowned (Zombies) or access the creative inventory to obtain this new item. Select Thanos Gauntlet in the hotbar to wear the item. By wearing the item you will gain multiple different status effects such as regenerating health, jump boost and speed.

Regeneration (6)
Resistance (6)
Night Vision
Jump Boost (4)
Strength (5)
Speed (4)
You will also have an increased damage effect when hitting mobs with the gauntlet. You’ll basically be a much more powerful version of yourself.
short_description: This add-on implements Thanos Gauntlet, also known as The Infinity Gauntlet, to the game.

description:
It’s not the fastest vehicle, but it’s definitely quite useful if you ever intend on going golfing in Minecraft 
You can either find it spawning naturally in your world, or you can use the creeper spawn egg from your creative inventory to spawn it. You can ride it immediately, but to start driving and control it you will need to use a key (also known as a carrot on a stick).
short_description: This add-on implements a golf buggy to the game by replacing the creeper.

description:
This is an addon which brings the animatronics in Five Night at Freddys to Minecraft Pocket Edition. You can tame them and keep them as your pets or fight any of them or the animatronic boss called Ennard. Most of the animatronics provide a great companionship as they will always try to protect you.
			
Changelog
New textures for blocks, items, armor, weapons and pumpkin mark
FNAF 4 Resource Pack
Updated for 1.0.5+
Party Room Chair (replaces skeleton)
Party Room Hat (replaces creeper skull)
Soda (replaces flower pot)
Egg textures (carry them and they become static)
Removed Freddy armor, replaced with Foxy armor

short_description: This add-on adds various new animals which are not yet in Minecraft.

description:
They’re heaps of fun, and that’s what we’re here for.
Crafting
To obtain any of these things, you have to craft the right sort of package (bulldozer-in-a-box!), place it down, and then destroy it. A spawn egg will drop and the fun will commence.
short_description: For your transporting pleasure we have bulldozers, dirtbikes, bicycles and … horse and cart

description:
The two new mobs include Jaws and Megalodon and together they will make the ocean much more scary! From here on, it is a very good idea to stay out of the ocean, or at least armed to the teeth in case you decide to go for a swim or for a boat ride.

Jaws has a health of 50 and deals 6 damage. They will spawn around the ocean at a spawn rate of 25-50%. It can attack dolphins, turtles, squids, and even players. Jaws drop alot of raw beef and a lot of bones.

Replaces Guardian
Health: 50 hearts
Attack damage: 6

Megalodon, king of the ocean. It has a health of 200 and deals 16 damage. They will spawn around the ocean at a spawn rate of 5-%. It can attack dolphins, jaws, turtles, squids and players. It can drop allot of raw meat, bone, and drops rare loots, which is golds and diamonds. This is one of the biggest sharks in the world 3-5 times larger then normal sharks.

Replaces Elder Guardian
Health: 75 hearts
Attack damage: 20
short_description: This add-on replaces the Guardian and Elder Guardian with two new vicious sharks.

description:
Introducing the Drill buddy! it can help you mine at a certain depth and collects the blocks it mines for you.
Here’s the crafting recipes!
To spawn these new entities, follow these steps:

hold the item in your hand
sneak
interact with the item, long-press the middle of the screen if you’re on mobile/right-click on Win10
drag the preview entity where you want to spawn it
interact with the preview entity to spawn the entity in your hand

Activation
To activate these entities, use their appropriate ‘keys’
Limits & Abilities
they all have the same inventory 
They can’t mine in water, contact upon water despawns them!

They may despawn mid-mining randomly because each drill buddy has their own durability, they’re based on the quality of material you used to craft them .
hole size of each drill:
wood = 1×1
stone = 3×3
iron = 5×5
gold = 7×7
diamond = 9×9
short_description: Watch the video for crafting recipes and how to spawn the drill

description:
Each of them include a unique set of behaviors. For example, some of them you can tame and ride and others you have to be extra careful with since their aggressive behavior will make them want to kill and eat you.

short_description: If your a fan of the clone wars, well, let me present my addon, The Clone Wars Addon

description:
The energy in this addon is called RF (redstone flux) and it is transferred to and from machines wirelessly by the power core. The power core can hold up to 100,000 RF and it automatically collects and sends it to machines without needing wires.

Machines
Combustion Generator – 13 RF/s – Input Coal
 Generates RF from coal (1 coal = 15 seconds)
Solar Generator – 4 RF/s
 Generates RF passively
Lava Generator – 30 RF/s – Input Lava Bucket
 Generates RF from lava (1 lava = 20 seconds)
Void Miner – 20 RF/s
 Generates ores using RF (1 ore/10 seconds)
Mechanical Furnace – 100 RF/ore – Input Ore
 Smelts ores and doubles them using RF (100 RF/input)
Power Core – 0/100,000 RF (Sneak interact to remove)
 Receives and transfers RF to all machines within 30 blocks
Sieve – 0 RF/s – Input Gravel
 Separates useful materials from gravel
short_description: This addon adds 7 new machines: sieve, lava generator, combustion generator, power core, void miner, solar panel, and mechanical furnace

description:
This add-on try to replicate a Minecraft Dungeons as same as possible from the real game. There are mobs, furniture, and many more that could be introduce ! . It could summon things, Blow things, add a new challenge to you, fight with them, play with them, as long as you can.

Changelog
Entities,
- Arch illager use the minecraft:angry mechanic
- Arch illager summon mechanic has been changed
- Arch illager will now drop mission loot chest or obsidian chest
- Arch illager health has been decreased to 340
- Arch illager will no longer summon Redstone Golem except the dificulty is set to hard
- Arch illager texture has been changed ( This assets are licensed by CC BY 4.0 and made by me )
- Arch illager will now use float/hover behavior
- Arch illager no longer drop loot like emerald
- Arch illager now drop an Xp
- Banner red will now use a proper function when place
- Bedroll will now use a proper function when place
ETC...
short_description: What if Minecraft Dungeons is in Minecraft Bedrock? Is it fascinating, isn’t it.

description:
Based off the portal gun from the popular game Portal, Portal 2 it’ll help you travel around your world. No scripts involved!
To get the blue portal gun you’ll need to craft it. It requires a nether star which is hard to obtain in survival mode.
Once you craft a blue portal gun you’ll be able to shoot a blue portal, you’ll then get a orange one to shoot a orange portal. Shift clicking or long pressing while on mobile will shoot a rotated portal, that you can use on floors or ceilings.
This add-on uses multiple teleport commands in functions, therefore it is prone to breaking, but will work 90% of the time. 
Changelog
New portal textures! Improved portal behavior, less chance to break.
short_description: This add-on adds a functional portal gun to the game

Added Laser Handgun ( replaces Fishing Rod ), No Explosion but lots of damage.
Added Laser Shotgun ( replaces Snowball ), Bigger Explosion than the Laser Rifle.
Added Laser Bazooka ( replaces Ender Pearl ), Bigger Explosion than the Laser Shotgun.
Added Laser Minigun ( replaces Bottle o’ Enchanting ), Same explotion with Laser Rifle and a high fire rate.

description:
By going underground and digging up fossils and collecting dna and genes then the player can ride the extinct animals and tame them and interact with them!

A Add-on that allows you to revive dead dinosaurs and other Prehistoric Creatures
What’s new in 1.1.0:
New ore spawning system
New and updated dinosaurs
New recipes for blocks and items
New ways to tame dinosaurs
Ride the animals

Recipes:
2 Fossils = 1 Dna
4 Dna = 1 gene
1 egg + 1 gene = dinosaur egg

Changelog
New Models new dinos new recipes updates models behaviors and animations tweaks they are still being worked on

description:
The zombies will have a baby. This add-on is not completed yet, so you won’t see zombie babies following their mothers and husks and drowned won’t breed. Baby zombies don’t age currently either.
Breeding Zombies is a risky business. The first thing you need to do is to capture two Zombies. Once that’s done you need to feed each of them some rotten flesh. They are still hostile, watch out, they might bite!

Once they have been fed they will do their little love dance.
A few seconds later a Baby Zombie is conceived
short_description: Tired of breeding cows? Now you can breed zombies! With the Zombie Breeding Add-On, you can use rotten flesh to breed zombies.

description:
Each furniture has a different use such as sitting or some kind of interaction (e.g. storage or trading). For example, the radio can be used for playing songs and the fridge can be used for storing food items. But the main and most important part is the fact that they look really good and can also be used just as decorations for your builds.

Changelog

Remodelled, and Retextured Furniture once again!
Statues can turn into “Trophy Statue” using Stone Pickaxe
Added Particles and Sound Effects while Unboxing or using Furniture
Tables and Coffee Tables can only put Foods in there Inventory
Furniture drops 10 Bit-Emeralds (Shulker Shell)
Computers can Spawn emeralds between 5 to 6 Minutes
Computers can equip your Written Books, and Enchanted Books
Computers now can turn on and off! (But you need to put shulker shell (Bit-Emerald) in order to turn off
Fridge Can now Freeze Water Bucket into Ice!
You can get all these Furniture Items to the Furniture Seller (Villager Priest) by spawning him using Bit-Emerald.
New Furniture Items: Blues CD, Pop CD, Rock CD, Furniture Remover, Safe Card, Red Gift, Blue Gift, Furniture Repairer, Barrels, Hedge, Lava Lamp, Snorkel, Amulet, Magical Diaper, Slime Boots
Bugs Fixed!

short_description: This is a modern warfare / apocalyptic Addon.

description:
At this moment there are just three new animals added but hopefully in the future this will expand into a greater variety of animals. It’s really useful in case you want some more animals in your world, or just like adding new entities to your world, as it is indeed for version 1.8 and above.
Deers
Have own spawn egg
There will be two types
Spawn anywhere
Drop Leather & Bone when death
Flamingo
Have own spawn egg
Spawn on the beach
Can be mated with salmon
There will be two types in the future
Dodo
Have own spawn egg
Spawn on Taiga Biome and Jungle
Can be mated with cod and salmon
short_description: This add-on adds various new animals which are not yet in Minecraft.
